column4: BIDDER HAS TO DO COMPLETE INSTALLATION WORK/SUPPLY INCLUDINGCIVIL STRUCTURE, WIRING, EARTHING , CHANGEOVER AND ANY OTHERMANDATORY THINGS REQUIRED.
BIDDER HAS TO TAKE FULL WARRANTY OF THE DG SET FOR 36 MONTHSFOR ANY REPLACEMENT AND REPAIRING ON SITE, NO MONEY WILL BE PAYUPTO THE NEXT 3 YEARS, SAME SHALL BE MENTION ON BIDDERLETTERHEAD
BIDDER HAS TO BEAR ALL THE COST OF LUBE OIL, FILTERS, MANPOWERAND ANY OTHER ITEMS REPLACEMENT DURING SCHEDULED MAINTENANCE,WHICH WILL BE CONDUCTED MINIMUM TWO TIMES IN 1 YEAR.

THE SELLER HAS TO CONDUCT A THIRD PARTY INSPECTION AT THEIRPREMISES BEFORE DISPATCH OF THE GOODS FROM THE FOLLOWINGAGENCIES BVI, SGS, TUV AND THE COST OF THE INSPECTION WILL BE INSELLER'S SCOPE. THE TEST CERTIFICATE SHOULD SUBMIT TO THECONSIGNEE ALONG WITH THE DELIVERY OF THE MATERIAL.
